Pre-Game Insights: Carsley witnessed two other former Republic of Ireland internationals sink the Boys in Green in his opening game in charge.
Declan Rice and Jack Grealish got the caretaker manager off to a flying start in his first game in charge.
Harry Kane celebrated his 100th England appearance in quintessential Kane fashion.
Carsley will be under no illusions that anything other than first place would be a massive black mark next to his name.
Carsley could etch his name into England folklore as the first-ever Three Lions manager to win their first three games in charge without conceding.
Greece have demonstrated their League A credentials with comfortable beatings of Finland (3-0) and Ireland (2-0) in their opening two battles.
Ioannidis is sidelined, and the attacking burden should fall onto the shoulders of Vangelis Pavlidis.
Vlachodimos should win his 45th cap in goal for Greece this week.
